title: The One About the Zombie Apocalypse (Re-Release)
description:
This is a re-release of one of Bob and Monét's favorite episodes from the archives. Tune in to hear all of Bob and Monet's HOT opinions on the zombie apocalypse, learn flavor notes of tofu and human flesh, and hear Bob and Monét's predictions of the future!
See Monét and Bob on tour this fall by going to bobandmonet.com !!
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
@BobTheDragQueen
@MonetXChange
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
